belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ43
overview: A collection of shivering psychic images received by general posts; including 'Series Surveillance Camera Vending Machine', 'An album', 'Evidence video', 'Prospective platform', 'Ayutayu', 'A beast', 'Gyokutsuki collision', 'Track Record Part 2' and 'Follow-up record, Part 2'.
tagline: Can you face the truth reflected by the camera?
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video 43
